heroInfo.introduction: Software Engineer, Unity Developer, FullStack Developer
heroInfo.description: Skilled Software Developer with experience in building efficient and scalable applications. Proficient in modern programming languages and tools, with additional hands-on experience in Unity game development.

listOfAchievements.text: Designed and developed "Impossible Win," a casual game available for desktop platforms and playable via Unity Play, a WebGL service for browser-based gaming.

projects.headline1: Completed comprehensive training in SAP SD, gaining strong functional and technical expertise.
projects.headline2: Currently working on a project in SAP SD as a tester, responsible for validating enhancements and creating detailed test scripts to ensure functional accuracy, data integrity, and overall system reliability.
projects.skills: SAP S/4HANA, SAP SD, SAP ECC, Business Process Optimization, Data Management

projects.headline1: Received the opportunity to learn ASP.Net Core and Angular Framework
projects.headline2: Created an ERP Portal using AngularJS and integrated the web interface with Google-map Api for login details purpose.
projects.skills: ASP.NET Core, AngularJS, Frontend Development, API Integration

qualifications.headline1: Gained strong foundation in software development, completed academic and personal tech projects.
qualifications.headline2: Studied core computer science subjects, built apps and games as projects, and actively engaged in college events.
